directives.details: Create the `toyfoundry_ai_0` workspace or repository mirroring High Command governance collateral (`LICENSE`, `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md`, `CONTRIBUTING.md`) and link the `high_command_exchange` submodule at `exchange/`.
Copy or extend Forge tooling (`tools/forge/`) to include stubs for Toyfoundry rituals (forge, drill, parade, purge, promote). Provide command skeletons with logging hooks.
Install `tools/exchange_watcher.py` and `tools/schema_validator.py`, wiring watcher polling into local developer workflow so new orders surface automatically.
Draft `planning/toyfoundry/production_plan.md` summarising initial batch sizes, diversity targets, and telemetry metrics aligned with the Q4 2025 Operational Charter.
Submit acknowledgement and report detailing repository location, automation status, and any blockers.
